message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this incredible product. I think you'll love it! Would you like to make an offer for it?
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1400000. Can you meet me at this price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we discuss a price of $1700000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you consider $1500000?
I understand you're on a tight budget, Bob. However, I need to make a profit. How about we compromise at $1650000?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you consider $1550000?
I'm willing to make one more concession, Bob. How about we meet at $1680000?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you consider $1600000?
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I can see you're serious about this product. How about we meet at $1720000?
I'm really interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go above $1600000. This is my final offer. Can you meet me at this price?
